description: The AWS::NetworkManager::LinkAssociation type associates a link to a device. The device and link must be in the same global network and the same site.

GlobalNetworkId.description: The ID of the global network.
GlobalNetworkId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the global network.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

DeviceId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the device

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

LinkId.markdownDescription:
The ID of the link

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement
